LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.label: king hamster
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.description: A giant hamster. Instead of growing in size, they became docile. Intelligence is still stupid, but it can be tamed and used as pack animals. It adapts relatively well to hot temperatures.
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.1.label: left hand
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.2.label: right hand
LanguageData.RK_Leather_KingHamster.label: king hamster fur
LanguageData.RK_Leather_KingHamster.description: The furry pelt of king hamster. Hamsters' unique cuteness is easy to recognize even when they grow in size. Good at temperature regulation in Hot climates.
LanguageData.RK_Wool_KingHamster.label: king Hamster wool
LanguageData.RK_Wool_KingHamster.description: Soft, light and provides very good insulation. King hamster wool clothes can keep the body warm and ventilate even in extreme conditions.
